summary: REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3 appear to be implemented via a new centralized auth hook (non-anonymous identity check), stable router creation and profile gating in App layout, React Query enablement/error-handling changes to avoid unauthenticated calls, and match-3 input locking plus position-based (stable) stone keys to prevent remount flicker during cascades. Several additional UI/styling and game-architecture refactors were also introduced that are not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Homepage content/marketing layout changes (hero section, feature cards, game CTA, wallet section).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is focused on auth gating, query gating, and match-3 glitching fixes; it does not request homepage redesign/content additions.

hallucinated_features.description: Global design system / Tailwind token and color-system changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Styling/token revamps are not requested in REQ-1/2/3 and are outside the stated fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer changes including Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking and social media links.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; unrelated to auth/query/game glitch fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: New 3D game rendering/architecture modules (materials/layout/useStoneAnimations) beyond the specific anti-flicker/key stabilization requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 asks for stabilizing rendering/keys and disabling interaction during transitions; introducing multiple new modules/hooks is not explicitly requested (though it may support the fix).

hallucinated_features.description: ConnectWallet page adds strict wallet address format validation rules (66 chars, 0x prefix, hex-only).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 is about gating queries/mutations and handling auth errors; it does not request new wallet-address validation behavior.
